events.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event
events.description: Join us for the inaugural Builder Vancouver event! We'll introduce the Builder movement, explore Vancouver's Bitcoin ecosystem, and kick off our monthly meetup series. This is the perfect opportunity to meet fellow builders, learn about our community, and get involved.

schedule.title: Doors Open & Networking
schedule.description: Welcome! Grab a drink, meet fellow builders, and get settled in.

schedule.title: Welcome to Builder Vancouver
schedule.description: Introduction to Builder Vancouver, our mission, vision, and what makes Vancouver a great Bitcoin builder city.

schedule.title: Break
schedule.description: Short break for refreshments and networking.

schedule.title: Nostr and Building Community in Vancouver
schedule.description: Martin Montero from Rabble Labs presents on Nostr and the community being built in Vancouver.

schedule.title: Open Discussion & Q&A
schedule.description: Open discussion about Bitcoin building, Lightning Network, Nostr, and what you'd like to see in future meetups.

schedule.title: Networking & Collaboration
schedule.description: Continue the conversation, share ideas, and connect with fellow builders.

sections.title: What to Expect
sections.body: This inaugural event will introduce you to Builder Vancouver and our community. We'll cover what Builder is, why Vancouver is a great Bitcoin builder city, and what to expect at future meetups. There will be plenty of time for questions, discussion, and networking.

sections.title: Who Should Attend
sections.body: Everyone is welcome! Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer, a designer interested in Bitcoin UX, a curious newcomer, or someone building Bitcoin products - there's a place for you in our community.

sections.title: Getting There
sections.body: Location details will be announced closer to the event date. Follow us on social media for updates.

meta.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event | Builder Vancouver
